tasks.title: Welcome to CanBan — overview
tasks.description: CanBan combines Kanban and Calendar. Cards are tasks; columns are workflow phases (To do, In progress, Done, Deleted). Each card shows icons for priority, Scheduled and Deadline. Continue with the next cards to learn all features.

tasks.title: Create and edit tasks
tasks.description: Use the + button in a column header to add a card. Click a card to open details: change title, description, priority, tags, Scheduled and Deadline. Save to apply; delete from the modal if no longer needed.

tasks.title: Drag & drop and column options
tasks.description: Drag cards to reorder or move between columns. Drag a column header to reorder columns. Click a column title to rename. In the ••• menu: Compact view, Sort by priority, Add left/right, Delete. Preferences are stored per column.

tasks.title: Calendar and split view
tasks.description: From the top controls choose Kanban, Calendar or Both. In split view drag the central handle to resize. In Calendar switch between Day/Week/Month, jump to Today, and open tasks from the grid.

tasks.title: Undo/Redo, backup and trash
tasks.description: Use Undo/Redo to return to a previous state. Export a JSON backup and import it to restore data. Data is auto-saved in the browser. The Deleted column can act as a trash; or delete directly from the modal. Long titles are truncated; descriptions wrap.
